entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light later this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
